content: Sen. Flake? Pretty much describes this whole Trump circus show. Trump wants to cut Coast Guard budget by 1.3 Billion dollars. He plans to cut TSA & other departments to fund his 21.3 billion dollar Wall. He then has the balls to increase Coast Guard coverage of security for Trump’s Florida Castle, Mar-A-Largo. This clown & his Mafia family are shafting the tax payers over his antic’s & pipe dreams. Talk about political welfare.
